attributes.action: not to send our soldiers to kosovo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the two wars we are already fighting in is two to many!!WE should keep our people out we cannot afford it!! we are struggling with our economy already Serbia is a soverign land it has nothing to do with Britain /!we have no rite interfering in its politics

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
